description: The AWS::Amplify::Branch resource creates a new branch within an app.

AppId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: d[a-z0-9]+  
Update requires: Replacement

BranchName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: (?s).+  
Update requires: Replacement

BuildSpec.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 25000  
Pattern: (?s).+  
Update requires: No interruption

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption

EnableAutoBuild.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

EnablePerformanceMode.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

EnablePullRequestPreview.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentVariables.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Framework.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption

PullRequestEnvironmentName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 20  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption

Stage.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: EXPERIMENTAL | BETA | PULL_REQUEST | PRODUCTION | DEVELOPMENT  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 5500  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption

EnvironmentVariable.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

EnableBasicAuth.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

Username.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

Password.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 255  
Update requires: No interruption

BasicAuthConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 1000  
Pattern: (?s).*  
Update requires: No interruption
